In order to generate valid .mylogin.cnf files, the mysql_config_editor utility has been used.

command to create a .mylogin.cnf entry:
mysql_config_editor set --login-path=local --host=localhost --user=root --port 1234 --socket socket --password

command to print .mylogin.cnf data:
mysql_config_editor print --all

reference:
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.4/en/mysql-config-editor.html
